拜一拜offer god同interview god

Offer god
每日一拜

My friend Joe is a CFO in the Hilton who receives a six-figure salary each month. Joe is a Taurus. He's been having a crush on this girl named Joyce for eight years but Joyce has a boyfriend. His friend said "That's totally fair. She's quite attractive" But he's beginning to realise he has no place in her scheme of things. He is just being a doormat. His dad said "You'll be better off without her" His uncle too said "You would be better off without her" He's a CFO in the Hilton. If he takes the job in Morgan Stanley he'll be three thousand dollars a month better off but he's still better off now than he was four years ago when he was working beneath everyone else in the department. He thinks a financial assistant position is beneath him. If he hadn't taken the CFA exam level three four years ago he wouldn't be working as a manager now. If he had pursued a career in sales instead of finance, his salary would be much lower. If it hadn't been for his uncle's referral his career wouldn't take off now and he wouldn't start earning a lot of money. His sister married her high school sweetheart last Tuesday. Her mum felt she was marrying beneath her. Her auntie feels her husband was beneath her too. She enjoys socialising with the better off. Joe is a science fiction fan. He said "If starship really would exist I would quit my job and spend the rest of my life roaming the universe" Last month he was away on a business trip to Hokkaido. After his trip I said "If you should travel there again can you get me a pack of white lover cookies please?" He's a computer expert. His cousin has to write a report which is due on Tuesday but she's having problems with the computer. If Joe will go and fix his computer his cousin will be so thankful for his help. She also has exams next monday so she's better off revising at home over the weekend. Joe's favourite fighter Dan has recently won his retirement fight. He's eternally grateful to his coaches and thankful that he has got a job as a colour commentator after he retired from the sport. All the fans wanna see Randy versus Fred. If Fred would sign a deal with the organisation Dana will make the fight happen. After Randy read the terms and conditions of the contract Dana's assistant said "If you would just sign here please"Joe's brother is a concierge in a hotel. I said "If it'll make you happy i'll come to stay for two nights as company for you while your colleagues are away" By next century scientists will have invented starships. As I'm fascinated by the science of starships I'm gonna ask physics professor Dr. Cho about it. I'm gonna wait outside the lecture room at quarter after six. He'll have finished his lecture. I thought about phoning him at quarter of three but my friend said "Don't phone him now. He will not have finished his lecture yet" It's true he wouldn't have finished teaching yet. I saw Joey live twice with my friends at the Hong Kong Colosseum which was absolutely incredible and unforgettable. It was a worthwhile concert that was compelling enough to see again. I remember we were late. I said "Look at the time. The concert will have begun" It was twenty five past eight. The concert would've started by then. Joey Yung has been strutting her stuff since she was a kid so don't sell her short. At the end of the last encore she bowed onstage soaking up the applause. She met with a standing ovation and thunderous applause. Joey and the dancers and acrobats who were invited to perform alongside her gave a superb performance. The stage and lighting design, the glow sticks and the choreography were magnificent and beyond all expectations. My cousin's husband is planning on having Joey endorse her company's products but he'll have to make it financially worthwhile for her. He's very career-oriented. Joey has a worthwhile job and career. I consider singing to be a worthwhile career. Sax, cor anglais and clarinet are transposing instruments.
